forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers after 8am. Mostly cloudy. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 51 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 11pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 48, with temperatures rising to around 50 overnight. Northeast wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. East wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Light Rain Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 8pm, then rain likely and a chance of thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. East northeast wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
